Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item, but a solution tailored to enhance your specific needs. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering the market standards and the cost we incur to produce it, I am offering you this product for $200. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and bring significant value to your life or business. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
